category.name: wcf.message
category.item:
This {if $type === 'image'}image{elseif $type === 'quote'}quote{elseif $type === 'media'}media{else}attachment{/if} is being checked for possible copyright issues. Current predicted waiting time: Calculating....

More informations

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Starting at 12 AM on the selected day.
Until 12 AM of the selected day.
When enabled, uploaded avatars will be hidden and replaced by a generic avatar within the given time of the event.
When enabled, embedded images using the IMG BBCode will be hidden and replaced with a notice within the given time of the event.
When enabled, quotes without any and/or with external sources will be hidden and replaced with a notice within the given time of the event.
When enabled, embedded attachments will be hidden and replaced with a notice within the given time of the event. Non-embedded attachments will be hidden without further notice.
When enabled, embedded media using the MEDIA BBCode will be hidden and replaced with a notice within the given time of the event.
When enabled, uploaded cover photos will be hidden within the given time of the event.
